channel.title: Im new, wats link to make a server
channel.description: im new so can sum 1 post link to how to make server step by step?

item.title: Im new, wats link to make a server
item.dc:creator: @judgechaos judgechaos
item.description:
@judgechaos wrote:

here ill make this simple for you…

  1. Find a source that fits you

  2. donload a JDK v6.1 or .1 im not sure…but just get the latest.

3.open client.java (thing called client in ur folder…its in either word or notepad)

4.hit cntrl + H type in the name of the existing server and type ur name of server in the bottom…

5.replace all server names to urs…exapmle: current:hiyascape after:ricscape

6.do same as 4 but type in the owners name and ur acc name…

7.close client.java and compile. and done…if u need help wid specs and other things just type it here in this section

Read full topic
item.source: Im new, wats link to make a server
